definition: complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Wolves and dogs can interbreed and produce offspring.
sentences.chinese: 狼和狗能够异种交配而且繁育后代。

sentences.english: Breeding drugs would be a medical boon .
sentences.chinese: 药物繁育是医药学的一个恩惠。

sentences.english: Why is it important to create a dinosaur or chickensaur?
sentences.chinese: 繁育一只恐龙或者“小鸡龙”的意义是什么？

sentences.english: The arrangement was set up under a Sino-Japanese cooperation program on giant panda breeding.
sentences.chinese: 这是中日合作大熊猫繁育项目的安排。

sentences.english: At present, Seedling-breeding with sowing is the main way of propagating Zygophyllum xanthaxylum (Bunge) Maxim.
sentences.chinese: 目前播种育苗是繁育霸王的主要途径。

sentences.english: Breeding was once a craft belonging solely to the gardener.
sentences.chinese: 繁育新品种曾经是园丁专有的一门手艺。

sentences.english: This “nature farm” serves as a breeding center and a center of rehabilitation for white whales.
sentences.chinese: 这个“自然的农场”作为白鲸的繁育和康复中心。

sentences.english: Second, the propagation and artificial breeding techniques of H. schlegeli was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 对池蝶蚌的繁育技术进行了研究。

sentences.english: Did some breeder breed her, or did she fall down from above?
sentences.chinese: 是有人繁育了她，还是平白从天上掉下来的？

sentences.english: They are part of the human procreation process.
sentences.chinese: 它们是人类繁育过程的一部分。

sentences.english: The paper mainly describes its genetic characters and breeding technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了其遗传性状和繁育技术。

sentences.english: All of them German Shepherd (GSD) fanciers and breeders.
sentences.chinese: 他们全是些德牧爱好者和繁育者。

sentences.english: Why not let the aquarist breed their own?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不让水族馆爱好者们繁育自己的品种呢？

sentences.english: Better breeding of animals that produce less methane is also starting to happen.
sentences.chinese: 也开始做到能使动物更好的繁育，产生更少的甲烷。

sentences.english: It was back- busting and happy to breed husky, I would like to approve it by achievements.
sentences.chinese: 哈士奇的繁育是辛苦而快乐的，我要用成绩证明一切。

sentences.english: And there are some tiger- lions which is also very rare.
sentences.chinese: 也有虎狮繁育杂交所产的虎狮兽，同样极其罕见。

definition: (agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety
population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
to give birth (animals)/to bear a litter
